name: This Little Town
description:
A small town in Colorado called Auraria  is being perverted and consumed by an ancient evil beyond this world. It's up to Jamal Williams, the local Sheriff, to stop it before it consumes everything he knows and loves.

The game uses mechanics found in many JRPGs along with a more robust character controller. In its current state, the game is beatable in a few hours. If people like it, I have plans to expand with more towns, landscapes, and quests.  I will release a Linux version as well if people are interested.
